title: Corporate rivalry turned into full blown attack
selftext:
CEO and MD murdered in broad daylight in Bengaluru. 

Victims Phanindra Subramanya and Vinu Kumar were the MD and CEO of Aeronics Internet Company, respectively. They were stabbed to death on Tuesday, July 11. 

The Bengaluru Police have arrested all three accused in the murder of the Managing Director (MD) and Chief Executive Officer (CEO) of a tech company in the city. The accused have been identified as Shabarish, Vinay Reddy and Santosh.

​
